question: Who released the logo of the 22nd Asian Athletics Championships?
explanation: Odisha Chief Minister Naveen Patnaik released the logo and mascot of the 22nd Asian Athletics Championships. It is scheduled to be held at the Kalinga Stadium in Bhubaneshwar from July 6 to 9, 2017. More than 700 athletes from around 45 countries would participate in 42 events ? 21 for men and 21 for women.
